description: A series of mysterious disappearances has left the coastal town of Nice, France, in turmoil. As the sun sets over the Mediterranean, shadows of doubt loom over the local art community. Investigate the intertwined lives of artists, collectors, and the secrets they harbor. Can you untangle the web of deceit before the final brushstroke is painted?
